title: Thereâ€™s More to Being Happy than the Exterior | Evelyn Lozada
description: Today we're going to speak to Evelyn Lozada, who is best known for nine seasons of the VH1 series Basketball Wives. Recently, she announced that she will not be returning for season 10. So we're going to get the scoop on that. But also, she's really hoping to move forward in the future and focus on her beauty line.
